control_node.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /*
2  this control node is used as a simple control methode to let the car go alone the lane,
3  and do the lane-changing if necessary. it is only a real time control without any prediction.
4 */
5 #include <ros/ros.h>
6 #include <sensor_msgs/Range.h>
7 #include <std_msgs/Int16.h>
8 #include <image_transport/image_transport.h>
9 #include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
10 #include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>
11 #include <dynamic_reconfigure/server.h>
12 #include <pses_control_2/TutorialsConfig.h>
13 #include "opencv2/opencv.hpp"
14 
15 #define stopSign 99999999
16 
17 static int control_deviation = 0;
18 pses_control_2::TutorialsConfig newconfig;
19 
24 class deviation
25 {
26  public:
27  int P = 270;
28  int I = 0;
29  int D = 3;
30  int distance = 0;
31  int distanceMem[25] = { 0 };
32  int distanceSum = 0;
33 
34  void pushIntoDistanceMem(int element)
35  {
36  for (int i = 39; i > 0; i--)
37  {
38  distanceMem[i] = distanceMem[i - 1];
39  }
40  distanceMem[0] = element;
41  }
42  void getDistanceMemSum()
43  {
44  for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++)
45  {
46  distanceSum += distanceMem[i];
47  }
48  }
49 };
50 
55 void callback(pses_control_2::TutorialsConfig &config)
56 {
57  newconfig = config;
58  ROS_INFO("Parameter are reconfigured:\n P:%d\n I:%d\n D:%d\n H_min:%d\n H_max:%d\n S_min:%d\n S_max:%d\n V_min:%d\n V_max:%d\n turn:%d\n",
59  config.P_int_param,
60  config.I_int_param,
61  config.D_int_param,
62  config.H_min_int_param,
63  config.H_max_int_param,
64  config.S_min_int_param,
65  config.S_max_int_param,
66  config.V_min_int_param,
67  config.V_max_int_param,
68  config.turn);
69 }
70 
74 void imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
75 {
76  static int imagecounter = 0;
77  imagecounter++;
78  try
79  {
80  cv::Mat image = cv_bridge::toCvShare(msg, "bgr8")->image;
81  cv::Mat HSVImage;
82  cv::Mat HSVImage2;
83  cvtColor(image,HSVImage,CV_BGR2HSV);
84  cvtColor(image,HSVImage2,CV_BGR2HSV);
85 
86  // filter for green line and pink line
87  cv::Mat ThreshImage;
88  cv::Mat ThreshImage2;
89  cv::Mat FiltedImage;
90  cv::Mat FiltedImage2;
91  int H_min = newconfig.H_min_int_param;
92  int H_max = newconfig.H_max_int_param;
93  int S_min = newconfig.S_min_int_param;
94  int S_max = newconfig.S_max_int_param;
95  int V_min = newconfig.V_min_int_param;
96  int V_max = newconfig.V_max_int_param;
97  inRange(HSVImage,cv::Scalar(H_min,S_min,V_min),cv::Scalar(H_max,S_max,V_max),ThreshImage);
98  inRange(HSVImage2,cv::Scalar(135,S_min,V_min),cv::Scalar(175,S_max,V_max),ThreshImage2);
99  medianBlur(ThreshImage, FiltedImage, 7);
100  medianBlur(ThreshImage2, FiltedImage2, 7);
101  // cv::imshow("view", image);
102  // cv::imshow("view2", FiltedImage);
103  // if(imagecounter == 30)
104  // {
105  // cv::imshow("view", FiltedImage);
106  // cv::imshow("view2", FiltedImage2);
107  // imagecounter = 0;
108  // }
109 
110  //the x-coordinate of the line when the car goes straight on
111  int standarLineRight[20] = {61,61,61,62,62,62,63,63,63,63,64,64,64,65,65,65,66,66,66,66};
112 
113  //store the green line pixel
114  int subMatrix[20][100];
115  double colpick = FiltedImage.cols / 100.0;
116  double rowpick = FiltedImage.rows / 60.0;
117  for (int c = 0; c < 100; c++)
118  {
119  //take 1/3 lower part of the FiltedImage and store it in the submatirx
120  for (int r = 0; r <= 19; r++)
121  {
122  int col = c * colpick;
123  int row = (r+40) * rowpick;
124  uchar pixel = FiltedImage.at<uchar>(row, col);
125  if (pixel > 100)
126  {
127  subMatrix[r][c] = 1;
128  }
129  else
130  {
131  subMatrix[r][c] = 0;
132  }
133  }
134  }
135 
136 
137  //store the pink line pixel
138  int pinkLine[30] = {0};
139  double colpick2 = FiltedImage2.cols / 100.0;
140  double rowpick2 = FiltedImage2.rows / 60.0;
141  for(int r = 0; r < 30; r++)
142  {
143  for(int c = 0; c < 100; c ++)
144  {
145  int row2 = (r+30) * rowpick2;
146  int col2 = c * colpick2;
147  uchar pixel2 = FiltedImage2.at<uchar>(row2, col2);
148  if(pixel2 > 100)
149  {
150  pinkLine[r] = c;
151  }
152  }
153  }
154 
155  //using linearization to "fill" the dashed pink line
156  //with y = a*x + b
157  double tmp1 = 0;
158  double tmp2 = 0;
159  int tmp2cnt = 0;
160  for(int i = 29; i >= 0; i--)
161  {
162  if(pinkLine[i] != 0)
163  {
164  tmp1 = pinkLine[i];
165  break;
166  }
167  }
168  for(int i = 28; i >= 0; i--)
169  {
170  if(pinkLine[i] != 0)
171  {
172  tmp2 = tmp2 + (pinkLine[i] - tmp1)/((29-i));
173  tmp2cnt++;
174  }
175  }
176  tmp2 = tmp2 / tmp2cnt;
177  for(int i = 29; i >= 0; i--)
178  {
179  pinkLine[i] = (int)(tmp1 + tmp2*(29-i));
180  if(pinkLine[i] < 0)
181  {
182  pinkLine[i] = 0;
183  }
184  if(pinkLine[i] > 99)
185  {
186  pinkLine[i] = 99;
187  }
188  }
189 
190  //store the "new" pink line
191  int subMatrix2[30][100] = {0};
192  for(int r = 0; r < 30; r++)
193  {
194  subMatrix2[r][pinkLine[r]] = 1;
195  }
196 
197 
198  int turn = newconfig.turn;
199  //get the deviation(Abweichung)
200  deviation devi;
201  devi.distance = 0;
202  //stop flag;
203  int noVision = 0;
204  //tur0 == 1 means it goes alone right side green line, -1 pink line
205  if(turn == 1)
206  {
207  ROS_INFO("green green green");
208  int lastValidSearch = 0;
209  for(int y = 19; y >= 0; y--)
210  {
211  for(int search = 0; search < 33; search++)
212  {
213  int startPonit = standarLineRight[y];
214  int toLeft = startPonit - search;
215  int toRight = startPonit + search;
216  if(subMatrix[y][toLeft] == 1)
217  {
218  lastValidSearch = -search;
219  devi.distance = devi.distance - search;
220  break;
221  }
222  if(subMatrix[y][toRight] == 1)
223  {
224  lastValidSearch = +search;
225  devi.distance = devi.distance + search;
226  break;
227  }
228  //if not find, use last valid search
229  if(search == 32)
230  {
231  noVision++;
232  devi.distance = devi.distance + lastValidSearch;
233  }
234  }
235  }
236  }
237 
238  if(turn == -1)
239  {
240  ROS_INFO("pink pink pink");
241  int lastValidSearch = 0;
242  for(int y = 19; y >= 0; y--)
243  {
244  for(int search = 0; search < 30; search++)
245  {
246  int startPonit = standarLineRight[y];
247  int toLeft = startPonit - search;
248  int toRight = startPonit + search;
249  if(subMatrix2[y + 10][toLeft] == 1)
250  {
251  lastValidSearch = -search;
252  devi.distance = devi.distance - search;
253  break;
254  }
255  if(subMatrix2[y + 10][toRight] == 1)
256  {
257  lastValidSearch = +search;
258  devi.distance = devi.distance + search;
259  break;
260  }
261  //if not find, use last valid search
262  if(search == 29)
263  {
264  noVision++;
265  devi.distance = devi.distance + lastValidSearch;
266  }
267  }
268  }
269  }
270 
271 
272  devi.pushIntoDistanceMem(devi.distance);
273  devi.getDistanceMemSum();
274  devi.P = newconfig.P_int_param;
275  devi.I = newconfig.I_int_param;
276  devi.D = newconfig.D_int_param;
277  //we actually only used PD Regler
278  control_deviation = (devi.P * devi.distanceMem[0] - devi.D * (devi.distanceMem[0] - devi.distanceMem[3]) + devi.I * devi.distanceSum/100)/100;
279  //a flag, works when no vision, to stop the car
280  if(noVision == 20)
281  {
282  control_deviation = stopSign;
283  }
284  cv::waitKey(10);
285  ROS_INFO("Control deviation set! deviation = %d", control_deviation);
286  }
287  catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e)
288  {
289  ROS_ERROR("Could not convert from '%s' to 'bgr8'.", msg->encoding.c_str());
290  }
291 }
292 
293 void imageCallbackTest(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg) {
294 
295 }
296 
297 int main(int argc, char** argv)
298 {
299  // init this node
300  ros::init(argc, argv, "control_node");
301  // get ros node handle
302  ros::NodeHandle nh;
303 
304  //reconfig
305  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<pses_control_2::TutorialsConfig> server;
306  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<pses_control_2::TutorialsConfig>::CallbackType f;
307 
308  f = boost::bind(&callback, _1);
309  server.setCallback(f);
310 
311  // sensor message container
312  std_msgs::Int16 motor, steering;
313 
314  // generate subscriber for sensor messages
315  // ros::Subscriber imageSub = nh.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Image>(
316  // "kinect2/qhd/image_color", 1, boost::bind(imageCallback, _1, &control_deviation, &newconfig));
317  ros::Subscriber imageSub = nh.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Image>(
318  "kinect2/qhd/image_color", 1, imageCallback, ros::TransportHints().tcpNoDelay());
319 
320  // generate control message publisher
321  ros::Publisher motorCtrl =
322  nh.advertise<std_msgs::Int16>("/uc_bridge/set_motor_level_msg", 1);
323  ros::Publisher steeringCtrl =
324  nh.advertise<std_msgs::Int16>("/uc_bridge/set_steering_level_msg", 1);
325 
326  // cv::namedWindow("view");
327  // cv::namedWindow("view2");
328  cv::startWindowThread();
329  //change the exposure
330  cv::VideoCapture cap;
331  cap.set(cv::CAP_PROP_EXPOSURE,10);
332 
333  // Loop starts here:
334  // loop rate value is set in Hz
335  ros::Rate loop_rate(25);
336 
337  //control variable
338  int lastValidDeviation;
339  int lastside = newconfig.turn;
340  int laneChangeCnt = 30;
341  while (ros::ok())
342  {
343  steering.data = control_deviation;
344  motor.data = 300;
345 
346  if(steering.data >= 900)
347  {
348  steering.data = 900;
349  }
350  if(steering.data <= -900)
351  {
352  steering.data = -900;
353  }
354 
355  //when the lane changing happens
356  if(lastside != newconfig.turn)
357  {
358  steering.data = 900 * newconfig.turn;
359  if(laneChangeCnt < 10)
360  {
361  steering.data = 900 * newconfig.turn * (-1);
362  }
363  motor.data = 300;
364  laneChangeCnt--;
365  //finish lane change and reset the procedure
366  if(laneChangeCnt == 0)
367  {
368  lastside = newconfig.turn;
369  laneChangeCnt = 30;
370  }
371  }
372 
373  // //stop the car because no vision
374  if((control_deviation == stopSign) && (lastside == newconfig.turn))
375  {
376  motor.data = 0;
377  motorCtrl.publish(motor);
378  }
379  else
380  {
381  lastValidDeviation = control_deviation;
382  }
383 
384  // publish command messages on their topics
385  ROS_INFO("steering %d motor %d", steering.data, motor.data);
386  steeringCtrl.publish(steering);
387  motorCtrl.publish(motor);
388  // side note: setting steering and motor even though nothing might have
389  // changed is actually stupid but for this demo it doesn't matter too much.
390 
391  // clear input/output buffers
392  ros::spinOnce();
393  // this is needed to ensure a const. loop rate
394  loop_rate.sleep();
395  }
396 
397  ros::spin();
398 }
